verses.roman:
kālanemir hataḥ kaṁsaḥ
pralambādyāś ca sad-dviṣaḥ
ayaṁ ca yavano dagdho
rājaṁs te tigma-cakṣuṣā

synonyms: kālanemiḥ—the demon Kālanemi; hataḥ—killed; kaṁsaḥ—Kaṁsa; pralamba—Pralamba; ādyāḥ—and others; ca—also; sat—of those who are pious; dviṣaḥ—envious; ayam—this; ca—and; yavanaḥ—barbarian; dagdhaḥ—burned; rājan—O King; te—your; tigma—sharp; cakṣuṣā—by the glance.
translation: I have killed Kālanemi, reborn as Kaṁsa, as well as Pralamba and other enemies of the pious. And now, O King, this barbarian has been burnt to ashes by your piercing glance.
